item.title: Depthfirst Raises $40 Million in Series A
item.description: Depthfirst, a San Francisco, CA–based AI-powered security company, has raised $40 million in Series A funding. Investors The round was led by Accel, with participation from Alt Capital, BoxGroup, Liquid 2 Ventures, Mantis VC, SV Angel, and prominent angel investors including Jeff Dean and Kirsten Green. Founded in 1983 and …

item.title: Coxwave Secures $5M Pre-Series A
item.description: Coxwave, a Seoul, South Korea–based AI product analytics platform provider, has secured $5 million in Pre-Series A funding. Investors The round was led by L&S Venture Capital, with participation from KB Investment, Hyundai Venture Investment, Hyundai Motor Company’s ZERO1NE Ventures, and KDB Capital. L&S Venture Capital is a South Korean …

item.title: Flip Raises $20 Million in Series A
item.description: Flip, a New York–based AI platform automating enterprise customer service calls, has raised $20 million in Series A funding, bringing its total funding to $31 million. Investors The round was co-led by Next Coast Ventures and Ridge Ventures, with participation from Data Point Capital, ScOp Venture Capital, Bullpen Capital, Forum …

item.title: OurPetPolicy Closes $8 Million Series A
item.description: OurPetPolicy, a Boise, Idaho–based, AI-enabled animal and ESA management platform for rental housing operators, has raised $8 million in Series A funding. Investors The round was led by RET Ventures, with participation from StageDotO and Capital Eleven. RET Ventures is a venture capital firm actively shaping the future of the …

item.title: RISA Labs Raises $11.1 Million Series A
item.description: RISA Labs, a Palo Alto, California–based AI operating system for oncology, has raised $11.1 million in Series A funding. Investors The round was co-led by Cencora Ventures and Optum Ventures, with participation from Oncology Ventures, Z21 Ventures, and John Simon via Ventureforgood. Cencora Ventures is the corporate venture capital arm …

item.title: Protege Raises $30 Million Series A Extension
item.description: Protege, a New York-based AI data platform, has raised $30 million in a Series A extension funding round, bringing its total funding to $65 million. Investors The extension round was led by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), with returning investors including Footwork, CRV, Bloomberg Beta, Flex Capital, and Shaper Capital. Andreessen Horowitz …

item.title: Prudentia Sciences Lands $20M in Series A
item.description: Prudentia Sciences, a Cambridge, MA–based AI-native platform for life sciences due diligence and dealmaking, has raised $20 million in a Series A round, bringing its total funding to $27 million. Investors The round was led by McKesson Ventures, with participation from SignalFire and existing investors Iaso Ventures, Virtue, and GV. …
